name: Curieuse Channel: Tortoise Crossing
description:
3 giant tortoises wade with map strips. 6 sharks, 2 green torches.

Riddle: "Carriers of centuries do not lose the way."

Sophisticated painterly artwork using etched-parchment technique with Seychellois cultural motifs. Part of "The Siren's Map of Praslin" cipher series.
